price: 11. Ee weydii (gaalada) ma iyagaa abuur adag mise waxaa (kale sida malaa’igta,  samooyinka, iyo arlada) ee aan abuurnay?. Waxaanu ka abuurnay (dadka) dhoobo dhagta.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٖ لَّازِبِۭ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'taftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnā innā khalaqnāhum min ṭīnin lāzibin
